0.name: Kayaking at Lake Johnson
0.desc: This guided trip features Lake Johnson at its finest! If surfing Class III rapids aboard a sit-on-top whitewater kayak is your idea of the perfect day, we have just the ticket!

1.name: North Carolina Museum of Art
1.desc: The North Carolina Museum of Art is an art museum in Raleigh, North Carolina. It opened in 1956 as the first major museum collection in the country to be formed by state legislation and funding

2.name: Regal North Hills
2.add: 4150 Main at North Hills St, Raleigh, NC 27609
2.desc: Theater complex with multiple screens featuring new release films, plush seating & concession stand.

3.name: K1 Speed - Indoor Go Karts, Corporate Event Venue, Team Building Activities
3.add: 5579 NE Huffman St Suite 2, Hillsboro, OR 97124
3.desc: Our state-of-the-art location features museum-quality motorsport memorabilia, the latest all-electric Storm and Junior go-karts imported directly from Italy, an 11-turn road-course inspired track, arcade, and our Paddock Lounge that serves delicious food and refreshing beverages for all ages

4.name: Rood Bridge Park
4.add: 4000 SE Rood Bridge Rd, Hillsboro, OR 97123
4.desc: This 61-acre park with a wooded area offers sizable lawns plus paths, a playground & picnic tables.

5.name: Rice Northwest Museum of Rocks & Minerals
5.desc: Geology museum displaying an array of geodes, gems, minerals, petrified wood, fossils & crystals.

6.name: National Western Stock Show
6.desc: The National Western Stock Show, one of Colorado’s preeminent tourist destinations, held every January for 16 days.  A nationally recognized western heritage and entertainment event, the stock show hosts one of the world’s richest regular season professional rodeos, one of the country’s largest horse shows and Colorado’s largest western trade show.

7.name: Denver Zoo
7.desc: Sprawling facility with animal exhibits, shows & demonstrations, plus venues for eating & shopping.

8.name: Colorado Ballet
8.desc: Established in 1961 by Lillian Covillo and Freidann Parker, Colorado Ballet is a non-profit organization celebrating nearly 60 years of presenting world-class classical ballet and innovative dance in Denver.
